content.raw:
OK sorry, I missed an error in the data/ test, because find_segment_starts is used for the posterior bed as well. Is it acceptable to have separate find_segment_starts functions for these two? The data passed to it in the viterbi function is now a 2D array in order to find differences in labels and sublabels.

If so I can close this and resubmit with those changes
